timeline.bodyText: I just noticed this dependency has a different GAV than in Wildfly. It doesn't even exist in this version. Please remove it completely as it's not used.
timeline.author: martin-kanis
timeline.diffHunk:

timeline.bodyText: This version is used for product. Community version is down in community profile. Later when EAP CD19 will be out and the versions will be the same, we can simplify this.
timeline.author: martin-kanis

timeline.bodyText: I didn't find this GAV in Wildfly.
timeline.author: martin-kanis

replies.bodyText: wildfly uses apacheds-all 2.0.0-M24; the version of api-ldap-codec-standalone that ships in that jar is 1.0.0.
replies.author: douglaspalmer

timeline.bodyText: Please keep old version 7.3.0.GA-redhat-00004 for now. Build with new one is broken in PNC. Sorry for confusion.
timeline.author: martin-kanis
